channel.title: Delta Quest Problem 317
channel.description:
Well Im making a quest from scratch but the only thing is, you know when you start the quest and on the quest tab the text turns yellow, well for me it works perfectly just you have to log out and back in for it to update, is there anyway it can just go from red to yellow without me logging out.
Thanks for the help really appreciate it. ;D

item.title: Delta Quest Problem 317
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Thanks fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Quest Problem 317
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:5, topic:471913”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=589577.msg4176299#msg4176299 date=1355030854]

Create a trigger in which it sends an update Text String with a different color. This also might be a good time for a ‘checkpoint’.

P.S. DO NOT put this into a Process Method or your Updating Structure.

Why not? I’ve had to make a few things update through process because that was the only way it would…
[/quote]

There’s no need for it to be constantly updated.

EDIT: Think about what I said: ‘checkpoint’. I know you’ll see what I mean.[/quote]
Hmm you might be able to solve a flickering interface I had Rocket, I’ll pm you about it.

Read full topic
